name: Butternut Squash Puree With Orange and Ginger
recipeIngredient: 1 medium-size butternut squash, peeled and cut into 1/2-inch cubes
1 teaspoon salt, plus more to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place the squash in a medium-size saucepan and cover with cold water. Place over medium-high heat and bring to a boil. Reduce heat and simmer until tender, about 10 minutes. Drain well.
Place the squash in a food processor with the ginger and orange rind. Process until smooth. Add salt and pepper. Divide among 4 plates and serve immediately.
